channel.title: I need help with a little 2h problem
channel.description: ok i want to be able to change my godsword. its only used with 1 hand not 2, and i want it like the runescape now like that way of holding? but i cant get it to work. its only holding with 2 hand.

item.title: I need help with a little 2h problem
item.dc:creator: @chassy13 Chassy13
item.description:
@chassy13 wrote:

The runescape godsword stance isnâ€™t available on 317-377 servers. Although you can change the getStandAnim, getWalkAnim, and getWepAnim.
